# World Building Notes

## The Library
- Ancient repository of all knowledge
- Located in the center of the known world
- Has its own consciousness/awareness
- Restricted Section contains dangerous texts
- Only certain bloodlines can access deep archives

## The Tower
- Mysterious structure on the edge of the world
- Connected to the Library through unknown means
- "Awakening" = bad things happen
- Built by the Predecessors
- Contains something that must never be released

## Magic System
- Based on written words and symbols
- Must be spoken aloud to activate
- More ancient the language, more powerful the magic
- The Prophecy is the most powerful text ever written
- Reading the wrong thing can kill you

## The Prophecy
- Written by the First Keeper
- Predicts the Tower's awakening
- Contains instructions for stopping it
- But also contains instructions for accelerating it
- Alice can read it because of her bloodline

## Key Locations
1. The Library - center of world
2. The Tower - edge of world
3. The Outer Villages - where Alice is from
4. The Predecessor Ruins - scattered everywhere
5. The Void - what's beyond the world's edge
